lead_paragraph: In her show at Joe’s Pub, Ms. Buckley uses a sort of primal squall to lay bare emotional truths that are beyond words.

headline.print_headline: Framing Resilience in Wisdom and Range
headline.main: Review: Betty Buckley’s ‘Dark Blue-Eyed Blues’ Has Hardly Any Blues at All

snippet: In her show at Joe’s Pub, Ms. Buckley uses a sort of primal squall to lay bare emotional truths that are beyond words.
abstract: Stephen Holden reviews performance by Broadway singer Betty Buckley at Joe's Pub.
